note.p: Army officer. Lieutenant in the 49th regiment native infantry of Madras, India. Probably John Olive Buttler (1822/3–80), son of George Buttler and Mary Best of Droxford, Hampshire; d. 10 October 1880 aged 57, captain in Her Majesty’s Madras Army, of Coonoor, Madras presidency.
England, births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.com, accessed 2 June 2017)
India deaths and burials, 1719–1948 (Ancestry.com, accessed 2 June 2017)
